channel.title: Why are you here?
channel.description:
I'm starting to wonder, why some of you are here.
I've realized and matured a LOT this year, it's amazing how much I've changed.
Looking over this forum, I see a lot of useless spam, and a lottt of people bashing on each other.
I'm not saying there aren't some helpful people here, there are &I know some of them.
But still, I have to ask what are you doing here?
Does it make you happy to sit around and make many, really useless, insults? Do you enjoy doing this wherever you live?
No one cares whether you live with your parents, you have a girlfriend or a wife, you live in a box &goto an internet cafe. No matter where you are, you shouldn't have to do what many of you are doing here.
So if all you do is spam and cause problems, why are you here?

item.title: Why are you here?

item.title: Why are you here?
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

usernamelol I don’t think you’re a spammer lol.

I came here because I thought of mopar as a God before.
&I realized he had a site.
I stayed looking for RS Cheating ways, started programming, made a few scripts.
Then after the Aryan craze I stayed around to chat.
Then I left because of real life drama. But all of it is gone now &my life is perfect as I see it.
So I got bored &came back here to check up &decided to stay for a while, after finding out that there’s a new bot.
I want to start scripting again.

Read full topic

item.title: Why are you here?
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:13, topic:53244”][quote author=YourDistracted link=topic=75050.msg842113#msg842113 date=1170150766]Because its a really active interesting site i guess. With a whole range of people
[/quote]

I can understand how you think it’s that, cause I do too, to some extent.
But what do you think about the other 40% (estimation) of spam that crowds the site?[/quote]
Yeah, people could calm down on the spam. The problem is most of the community are teenagers and below. I guess they think it’s fun to “spam”. I try to make most of my posts “useful” and not spam. But yet you will see some that you might think are spam. But I try to make then as useful as can be.

I’m here because I first came here for private servers, I quit them and runescape. So now im here mainly for General Discussion, Questions, Scar boards, and the rest below eg: graphics 3rd party programs.

When I am active in most of the sections and someone asks a question or needs help, I try my best to find the answer off of the internet or if its in my head. I will search and search for it until I get tired of searching for it. Programming, I recently got into Visual Basics, C++, C#, J# and other programming languages all in .NET. I understand people think .NET sucks, but it really doesn’t.
Yes, you probably think im a “Spammer” because I have a warning. That is not the case.

Read full topic

i liek spam plz

item.title: Why are you here?
item.dc:creator: @Mmmk Mmmk
item.description:
@Mmmk wrote:

I dont know, no reason. I am just sticking around because once I was into runescape and cheating on it. Agees ago.

item.title: Why are you here?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:2, topic:53244”]I don’t know.

I hate runescape. I don’t have any interest in runescape cheating. And I have no interest of posting on forums. So I still cannot figure out why I am posting on a runescape cheating forum.

I think it’s just because I like to see what everyone is up to. I help others if/when I can, but I kinda spam sometimes. I on’t watch very much TV, and I don’t play many games so in my spare time I just screw around on the internet here or doing whatever. I guess it’s all just boredom.[/quote]
Same with me.

If i have nothing to do i’ll come on here. That’s after Piano gets boring.

Read full topic

item.title: Why are you here?
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

im here because im highly interested in runescape cheating. i dont give a damn why anyone else is here, so unlike you, i wont question it

item.title: Why are you here?
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Yeah I’m not too much into the RS section of it at all.
I think of it more like an obstacle.

Like, I’m not trying to make something so I can get tons of lobsters to cook and make money.
I’m trying to find a way to make something like that that works, and then expand.

Get it?

Read full topic

item.title: Why are you here?
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Im here for the general section.

I originally joined for private servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Why are you here?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Well, a friend told me about it a couple months ago(5 or 6 or so), and know I’m hooked

And there’s no way I could leave Mopar!

Read full topic

item.title: Why are you here?
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

Mainly because Mopar asked me to be here

Back at Kaits.com, i once made the mistake of saying i don’t need SCAR lessons, i know everything about it. Looking back now, my knowledge of Delphi has tripled in size.

Even though this site is primarily a RS cheating site, i see it more as a site where i can learn programming. There are so many talented people here and i have learnt so much just from viewing other peoples posts.

Most people are nice to talk to, and the users of this site used to have a lot of respect for each other. I suppose I’m hoping that sometime soon it will return like that.

Also, since i have been with these forums for about 2 years now, i have kinda grown up with a lot of the people still around.

Thats a few reasons for ya

Read full topic

item.title: Why are you here?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

I like to learn SCAR scripting and other programming, I have no real interest in runescape at all but I do enjoy looking over codes. I also like to talk to other people throughout the world although as you say a lot of people aren’t very nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Why are you here?
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

hahahah my reasons sound like yours.

Actually, I’m highly interested in scripting for ARGA, but I have no clue how to start cause apps are closed&stuff.

Besides that, I try to help, and try not to spam, and try to keep a good head on my shoulder.

I probably have better things to do.
But when I’m not hanging out with my girlfriend or doing school work, I try to make time to chat on here&stuff.

Read full topic

I think it’s just because I like to see what everyone is up to. I help others if/when I can, but I kinda spam sometimes. I on’t watch very much TV, and I don’t play many games so in my spare time I just screw around on the internet here or doing whatever. I guess it’s all just boredom.
